desc: Teleport Your Taste Buds. Liled’s Candy Kitchen opens a portal to the day you scored your first goal in soccer. Or that time you were laughing so hard with your sister, her milkshake started coming out of her nose. You never know what memory Liled's candy will bring you back to. But won't it be fun to find out?

layout.text: You never know what memory Liled's candy will bring you back to.
But won't it be fun to find out?
